title: Senior Backend Engineer - Distributed Scheduler
description: Build distributed job scheduler for batch processing. Own work distribution, failure handling, and cluster coordination.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Distributed Systems
description: Lead distributed systems architecture across org. Define consistency models, messaging patterns, and reliability standards.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Event Architecture
description: Lead event-driven architecture for platform. Drive event schema standards, versioning strategy, and cross-team adoption.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Resilience
description: Lead resilience engineering for distributed platform. Define failure budgets, recovery patterns, and chaos testing programs.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Messaging Platform
description: Lead messaging platform serving 500+ producers. Drive schema evolution, cluster scaling, and self-service tooling.

title: Principal Backend Engineer - Distributed Systems
description: Define distributed systems strategy and standards. Lead architecture reviews, establish consistency guidelines, and mentor staff engineers.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - Databases
description: Entry-level engineer learning database fundamentals. Will write queries, create indexes, and learn schema design with guidance.

title: Junior Backend Developer - Data Modeling
description: Entry-level developer learning data modeling. Will design schemas, write migrations, and understand ORM patterns.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - NoSQL
description: Entry-level engineer working with NoSQL databases. Will learn document modeling, aggregation pipelines, and index optimization.

title: Junior Backend Developer - SQL Optimization
description: Entry-level developer learning SQL optimization. Will analyze query plans, create indexes, and identify performance bottlenecks.

title: Backend Engineer - Database Administration
description: Build database administration automation for 50+ instances. Handle provisioning, monitoring, and automated failover.

title: Backend Engineer - Time Series
description: Build time series data infrastructure for IoT platform. Handle data ingestion, retention policies, and downsampling.

title: Backend Engineer - Graph Database
description: Build graph database solutions for recommendation systems. Handle graph modeling, traversal queries, and relationship indexing.

title: Backend Engineer - Data Migration
description: Build data migration tools for zero-downtime migrations. Handle dual-write strategies, data verification, and rollback procedures.

title: Backend Engineer - Query Optimization
description: Build query optimization tooling and monitoring. Handle slow query detection, index recommendations, and performance dashboards.

title: Backend Engineer - Column Store
description: Build analytics data layer with columnar storage. Handle data ingestion, materialized views, and query optimization.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Database Architecture
description: Design database architecture for multi-region platform. Own sharding strategy, replication topology, and consistency guarantees.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Database Scaling
description: Build database scaling infrastructure for 10TB+ data. Own horizontal sharding, query routing, and online resharding.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Data Warehouse
description: Design data warehouse for analytics platform. Own dimensional modeling, ETL optimization, and query performance.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Distributed Database
description: Build distributed database engine components. Own transaction processing, MVCC implementation, and Raft consensus.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Database Replication
description: Build database replication for disaster recovery. Own logical replication, cross-region sync, and failover automation.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - NewSQL
description: Build NewSQL database infrastructure for global platform. Own cluster operations, performance tuning, and schema management.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Database Platform
description: Lead database platform serving 200+ databases. Define provisioning standards, backup strategies, and self-service tooling.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Data Infrastructure
description: Lead data infrastructure for analytics organization. Drive data modeling standards, query optimization, and cost management.

title: Staff Backend Engineer - Database Engineering
description: Lead database engineering initiatives. Drive storage engine optimization, index innovation, and performance research.

title: Principal Backend Engineer - Databases
description: Define database strategy and architecture for enterprise. Lead technology selection, establish best practices, and mentor staff engineers.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - Security
description: Entry-level engineer learning security fundamentals. Will implement authentication flows, input validation, and learn OWASP guidelines.

title: Junior Backend Developer - Auth
description: Entry-level developer working on authentication. Will build login flows, session management, and learn password hashing.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - Access Control
description: Entry-level engineer implementing access control. Will build role-based permissions, policy enforcement, and learn authorization patterns.

title: Backend Engineer - Identity
description: Build identity management for enterprise platform. Handle user provisioning, SSO integration, and identity federation.

title: Backend Engineer - API Security
description: Build API security infrastructure. Handle token management, scope validation, and API key rotation.

title: Backend Engineer - Encryption
description: Build encryption infrastructure for data protection. Handle key management, envelope encryption, and crypto operations.

title: Backend Engineer - Security Automation
description: Build security automation for compliance. Handle vulnerability scanning, policy enforcement, and security reporting.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - IAM
description: Design IAM system for multi-tenant platform. Own fine-grained authorization, policy evaluation, and permission inheritance.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Zero Trust
description: Build zero trust security infrastructure. Own service identity, mTLS enforcement, and network policy automation.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Security Monitoring
description: Build security monitoring and threat detection. Own log analysis, anomaly detection, and incident alerting.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Secrets Management
description: Build secrets management platform for 500+ services. Own secret rotation, access policies, and audit logging.

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Compliance
description: Build compliance automation for SOC2/GDPR. Own evidence collection, policy enforcement, and audit trail generation.
